tool.name: Hurricane NMR pipeline
tool.description: Workflows for automatic processing and annotation of 1D 1H-NMR spectra from MetaboLights repository.
tool.command: LC_ALL=C Rscript $__tool_directory__/hurricane_runner.r peaks_loc '$peaks_location' spec_loc '$spec_location' output_dir '$__tool_directory__' cutoff $cutoff rank_limit $rank_limit dist_thresh $distance_threshold match_method '$match_method' refdb_file '$refdb_file' matlab_root '' ; return=\$?; cat 'log.txt'; sh -c "exit \$return"

param.name: peaks_location
param.label: .rds Files from your history containing the peaks to match against.

param.name: spec_location
param.label: .rds Files from your history containing reference spectra

param.name: cutoff
param.label: Cutoff for STOCSY deconvolution.
param.help: setting the cutoff outside of the range 0.7 / x / 0.95 is not recommended. If you nonetheless wish to do so please get in touch.

param.name: rank_limit
param.label: Rank limit for matching
param.help: IE with the default value of 5 the top 5 matches per feature will be preserved and the rest discarded

param.name: refdb_file
param.label: .rds File from your history that contains the referene spectra library
